system.sustained: The Psyker creates a warp-fueled shield that inflicts a penalty equal to their Psy Rating on any Weapon Skill or Ballistics Skill Tests targeting them. Additionally, if an enemy fails a Weaponskill or Ballistic Skill Test to attack the psyker, they gain 1 Insanity Point per two degrees of success the psyker scored on the Focus Power Test. The Psyker can only make Move Actions while sustaining this power.
